q1: How many caps does Messi have?
q2: What is a cap in football?
a2: A cap is when a player plays a game for their club. They earn one for each game played.
a3: Yes, and he has had 4 World Cup appearances.
a4: For now it is only a rumor but signs are pointing to him retiring this year.
q5: Who is a good player aside from Messi?
a5: Sergio Romero and  Cristian Ansaldi are both good players.
